name: black-flute
effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Decreases the wild Pokémon encounter rate by 50%.
short_effect: Halves the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A glass flute that
keeps away wild
POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A glass flute that
keeps away wild
POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A black glass flute.
When blown, it makes wild POKéMON
less likely to appear.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A black flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon less
likely to appear.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A black flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon less
likely to appear.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A black flute made from blown glass.
Its melody makes wild Pokémon less
likely to appear.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A toy flute made from black glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A toy flute made from black glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A lovely toy flute to admire.
It’s made from black glass.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A flute made from black glass. It makes it easier to
encounter strong Pokémon in the place you use it.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A flute made from black glass. It makes it easier to
encounter strong Pokémon in the place you use it.

A flute made from black glass. It makes it easier to
encounter strong Pokémon in the place you use it.
